title: Lab 06: Update Your Application
description: Welcome back! If you've been with us since Lab 01, you're already familiar with running two pods as part of our application deployment. But what happens when we need to update our application to a new version without causing downtime or service disruption? This scenario is common in projects where maintaining low latency, fault tolerance, and high availability is crucial. It's also a great opportunity to familiarize yourself with deployment strategies like blue/green and canary releases.

title: Kubernetes Learning Resources
description: A comprehensive guide to the best resources available for learning Kubernetes. This list includes courses, labs, cheat sheets, and eBooks, categorized by their access type (free or paid).
